author: taylor
msg: DatabaseBrowser portlet, first phase. This phase covers a basic, vector browser implementation. The browser only connects to the default Turbine database connection. Support for other database connections will be in the next phase, along with virtual resultset iteration, and sorting. In customize mode, the 2 params currently supported are:
- SQL statement (only against tables in the default database)

author: taylor
msg: * added new sample 'COFFEES' table to the hsql database
* added new styles to default.css for database browser table
* added two new templates for customization view and display view of database browser

author: kimptoc
msg: corrected the dependencies a little more

author: kimptoc
msg: make the maven build use the correct lib.repo throughout
